credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Robert T. Hoyt in memory of Hannah McAllister
dimensions: H x W x D: 30.5 x 20.3 cm (12 x 8 in.)
title: Sampler
provenance:
By 1968, Mrs. Robert T. Hoyt
1968, Cooper-Hewitt Museum
medium:
Medium: cotton embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in cross stitch on plain weave
description: Bands of alphabets and numerals separated by simple cross borders, with the inscription Maria Atwater. The lower band is unfinished. Embroidered in light blue, grey-green, pale yellow, and brownish-black.
name: Sampler
